item.title: How to Game Master Like a Fucking Boss
item.description: This book is a trainwreck and I enjoyed watching it crash — even though I would’ve been better off stepping away from it and averting my eyes. But I couldn’t help myself. This book is a list of tips and tricks about Game Mastering — it’s packed with references you probably won’t understand, misogynist art and sentences that will send you straight into an existential crisis in which you spiral into despair asking yourself why someone would ever put these words on a page.
